ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars The Separatist Droid Army
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add StarWar CIS Faction and this is my first Faction mod so be please be gentle with me
[h1]Mod Load Order[/h1] Core HugsLib JecsTools Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 [JDS] Star Wars BlasTech Industries [JDS] Star Wars - Separatist Droid Army
[h1]Features:[/h1] [b]Droids[/b] -B-1 Battle Droid -B-1 Specialist Droid -B-1 Commander Droid -B-2 Super Battle Droid -BX- Commando -Droidekas -IG-100 Maganguard -T-Series Tactical Droid -Super Tactical Droid
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Preview art inspires by "Star Wars - Factions"
